comments.body:
Please add a comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged: See: https://github.com/alecthomas/injector/pull/160
license_file: COPYING
...
```

I've opened a PR (https://github.com/alecthomas/injector/pull/160) to deal with the missing license file. This comment is a visual reminder to check the status of whether or not the file is included in a future release of the package. If it is, then you can delete the manually packaged copy in the feedstock. 

**update:** The PR has been merged upstream, so the license file should be in the next release whenever that is created upstream. I'd still like to see the comment in the `meta.yaml` until that happens.
Added; and thanks for the swift review!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@  license: BSD-3-Clause
  # License file manually packaged: See: https://github.com/alecthomas/injector/pull/160
  license_file: COPYING

extra:
